description:
Mathematics > Standard Multiple Choice

Read the following SAT test question and then click on a button to select your answer.

If x + (2 x) is 5 more than y +(2 y), then x -y =

(A) -5

(B) -(5 / 3)

(C) 3 /5

(D) 5 /3

(E) 5 

正确答案>>>

description:
沪江英乐：万众瞩目!格莱美开场震撼登场，Beyonce 联手老公 JayZ 带来大热单曲《Drunk In Love》，Bee夫妇现场有亲密互动！JayZ 和 Bee 姐在一起时总是有种莫名的二感，也许这就是真爱！他一个人表演时才是真厉害。

【Beyonce 联手老公JayZ 格莱美表演《Drunk In Love》】

Why can't I keep my fingers off you, baby?

We woke up in the kitchen saying

I'm swerving on that, swerving, swerving on that big body Been

We woke up in the kitchen saying

Drunk in love, we be all night
Last thing I remember is our

Hold up
